title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 209: Featuring Ben Bishop
description:
On Monday's episode of Spittin' Chiclets the guys are joined by Dallas Stars goalie Ben Bishop. Ben joins to talk about his career, his teammates in Dallas, and Sarah Palin. The guys then talk some NHL news, Phil Kessel, the TD Garden seats and more. Rear Ads wraps up the show with a gambling corner, hoping for his luck to change.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
